actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that unearned income of a child attributable to damages received on account of personal injuries or sickness of the child not be taxed at the marginal rate of such child's parents.

summary.text: Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions governing situations in which unearned income of a child under age 14 is taxed as if it were parental income. Excludes from income subject to the parental tax rate any earnings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that unearned income of a child attributable to damages received on account of personal injuries or sickness of the child not be taxed at the marginal rate of such child's parents.
